ANU.name: Kim Huynh
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
interest: Political theory, political literature, children and armed conflict, forced migration, Vietnamese politics and society.
ANU.biography: Kim is also a presenter and reporter for ABC Radio Canberra.
